Package co.edu.uptc.view

Class SingInView

java.lang.Object
co.edu.uptc.view.Header
co.edu.uptc.view.SingInView
All Implemented Interfaces:
EventListener, javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.event.ActionEvent>
public class SingInView extends Header implements javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.event.ActionEvent>
The SingInView class represents the view for user registration. It extends the Header class and implements the EventHandler interface for handling events.
